alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 14 at 1:55PM MST until December 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning is in effect today from 10 AM to 6 PM MST for gusty winds and low relative humidity for fire weather zones 233 through 237, which includes eastern Las Animas, Kiowa, Bent, Prowers and Baca Counties... ...A Red Flag warning remains in effect for Wednesday from 10 AM to 5 PM for VERY STRONG winds and low relative humidity values for fire weather zones 228 through 237, which includes Pueblo, Huerfano, Las Animas, Crowley, Otero, Kiowa, Bent, Prowers and Baca Counties, and additionally is now in effect for fire weather zones 226 and 227, which includes El Paso County... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 226 AND 227... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 10 AM to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 226 and 227. * Winds...West 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 80 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 15 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs
